text: "No More Mr. Nice Guy" is a song by American rock band Alice Cooper. It was released in 1973, and is a single from the band's album Billion Dollar Babies. The song reached number 25 on the Billboard Hot 100 music chart and number 10 on UK music charts. == References == Category:1973 songs Category:Alice Cooper songs Category:Megadeth songs
title: No More Mr. Nice Guy (song)
